## Data types

Data can be stored in differet types: factors, characters, integer etc. 

In `tibbles` we get the information directly printed

```{r}
head(mpg)
```

We can also access it for each column

```{r}
class(mpg$hwy)
```

## Convert data types

In particular useful when data is in wrong format after read-in. 

`as.numeric()`

`as.character()`

`as.factor()`

```{r, include = FALSE}
mpg2 <- mpg
```


```{r}

mpg2$manufacturer <- factor(mpg2$manufacturer)
mpg2

```
